original_title: Jay Blades: Learning to Read at 51
overview: Jay Blades, presenter of The Repair Shop, has decided itâ€™s finally time to learn to read. He has been told he has the reading age of an 11-year-old. Throughout his life he has found ways of avoiding the written word, and this film digs deep into how this has shaped him.
title: Jay Blades: Learning to Read at 51
